content: have a hole between the in next = in next stitch body and the tentacles slip_stitch between this to tighten it single_crochet = single_crochet up then half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet - chain 26 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 1 single_crochet in each of next 2 double_crochet = double_crochet 2 single_crochet in next 1 single_crochet in each of next 12 2 single_crochet in next 1 single_crochet in each of next 9 slip_stitch to body cut yarn instructions start body of octopus make necklace loop - chain 12 work 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 1 single_crochet in next 1 - chain as many sts as will fit around your head sew to half_double_crochet in each of next 3 1 double_crochet in each of next 2 1 half_double_crochet in top of octopus and wear with pirate pride each of next 2 1 single_crochet in last chain 2 turn www midnightknitter com copyright 2006
